attributes.additional_details:
The UK Border Agency plans to deport L/Cpl Isimeli Baleiwai, a Fijian born British Soldier after having served our country for 13 years. This must not happen. 'Bale' is a veteran of several conflicts who put life and limb on the line whilst wearing the uniform of the British Army, I urge David Cameron to do that right thing and prevent this appalling action.
**AUGUST 9th IS HIS DEADLINE**
